1.content:
You're walking about one day when you see a large rock on the side of the path that usually isn't there. You then see the surface of it glow, then revealing a strange doorway.

A female voice then calls out to you, "Reeeeeid..." it says in a singsong tone. You find it way too weird, but you're too curious not to want to go in, as you're rather bored anyway.

You soon find yourself in what looks strangely like an oriental palace, and there's a real-live Ninetales standing before you.

"Greetings, Reid," she says with a smile. It sounds like the same voice that called you a minute ago. You're a little freaked out. Not only is there a Pokemon standing in front of you, but she's talking.

"Please follow me," she then asks. Thinking that you must be dreaming you decide to follow her. You always did like Ninetales, and you figure that if this is your dream then she's likely to be nice to you anyway.

You then find yourself in a grandiose throne room, the throne itself having a very large nine-tailed pattern behind it. The Ninetales approaches the throne, then begins faintly glowing as her body begins morphing.

First she starts standing upright, then you watch as her forms shifts gently to something more fitting a biped, turning her forelegs into furry arms with hands, giving her a torso more like that of a humans complete with breasts, and finally, a beautiful and elegant cream colored kimono magically appears on her body. The transformation is not yet finished, however. Soon her muzzle flattens down into a simple face and nose, her remaining paws become feet, and all her fur fades into skin, save for the fur on her ears and tail.

Now sitting before you in the throne is a beautiful woman, presumably in her mid-twenties with long light blonde hair and the ears and tails of a Ninetales.

"Don't be alarmed, Reid. Please, do sit with me and I shall explain everything to you." Not being able to turn down a request from one so beautiful, you sit right next to her on her throne. She curls her tails around your back, making for a very comfy cushion as she gives you a light hug.

"How do you know my name?" you ask her. "Well, this is a world created from your subconscious. Everything here is likely something you've dreamt about at one point or another, be it daydream, sleeping dream, etc. I am the empress of this little world of ours. I think right now it's best to let you explore things from here on out. Feel free to go wherever you want."

"However, I would also like to tell you a few other things about this place. This is a land made up entirely of female beings like me. We can switch between any of the three forms you just witnessed at will and we can also change our size to whatever we wish, though most of us stay at normal sizes for whatever current species or form we're in."

"And before you go..." she pulls out a map to what appears to be the whole land. "Take this map, it identifies hotspots and places of interest all over the kingdom."

"Thank you, your highness," you then say as you decide to
1.title: Portal to the poke girl world

11.content:
You follow the path shown on the map towards the Northern district of the kingdom. Much like the empress' palace, this place seem to have an oriental flair to it, much like a large city in old Japan.

One of the things you notice most about the place are all the people inhabiting it. Everyone is either some sort of talking Pokemon, an anthropomorphic Pokemon, or a girl with the features of a Pokemon, and all the bipeds seem to be wearing kimonos. You see things like girls with Eevee ears talking to female anthro Pikachu and Gardevoirs conversing girls that have ears like an Arcanine and other oddities. You take a big look at everything and you realize that you think you're going to enjoy this world quite a bit.

You take a look at the hotspots on the map and decide to go
11.title: Head to the Nothern distruict

choices: 1.   Enter the first bath with an anthro Vaporeon
Continue on to take a look at the next bath
111.content:
You walk into the bath house, looking around to see who's here. You then meet a girl that appears to the the manager. Judging from the odd gray shell on her back you'd say she was a Lapras Pokegirl. "Hello there. Here are some shorts, please change before you enter any of the baths. Since you're the only male here, Mr. Reid, you'll have to share baths with females. Don't worry too much, all the bipeds are wearing bathing suits."

"How do you know my name?" you ask the manager. she giggles, then says, "Everyone here knows your name. The empress told everyone in the kingdom of your arrival before you even got here." Now go change and enjoy yourself. Don't worry, you don't need to pay us anything.

You go to the changing room and get yourself changed into the shorts, you come out and take a look at all the baths.

Much like in the streets, you see a very diverse group in the baths. Another note here is that there quite a lot of water types here. You then...
111.title: To the nearby bath house.

choices: Someone else comes out of the water
1111.content: Do you start a conversation with the vaporeon, or do you feel nervous about talking to her?
1111.title: 1.   Enter the first bath with an anthro Vap...

choices: You decide to keep looking around until you spot a very large bath area. For som
Keep looking, you'd rather go in one more populated.
1112.content: You decide to keep looking around until you spot a very large bath area. For some odd reason, it doesn't look like anyone else is inside it. You wonder why this could be...
1112.title: Continue on to take a look at the next bath

11122.content:
Deciding not to risk it, you continue on to the next bath. There is a lot of splashing and giggling coming from this bath.
Inside you see three girls a pikachu morph, seel morph, and pokegirl he can't quite identify. she has pink hair, black ears, small horns, and small darker colored patches of skin that suggested that in pokemon form, she would have spots.
You keep looking at her up and down, but the only other thing you noticed is that she has quite a large bust.
11122.title: Keep looking, you'd rather go in one more p...

111222.content:
You decide to continue heading into the bathhouse. At the next room, there is another group of girls though calmer than the last group.

One of the pokemorphs you immediately recognize, she is a Ninetails like the empress. Looking over the rest of the girls, you see an Absol pokemorph, a Lopunny pokegirl, and an Milotic pokegirl. The group of four girls are gossiping about something you can't quite make out until the Absol spots you at the entrance.

"Why don't you join us?" she says. The other girls look in your direction and start to flirt and try to persuade you inside.

"Yea, we want to know more about you," the Milotic says flipping back her red bangs of hair.

"We won't bite that hard," the Ninetails teases.
111222.title: continue on

1112221.content:
You decide to take up their offer and slowly walk into the bath to join them. "My name's Reid," you say, "but I'm sure you know that already."

"Of course," the Absol says while swimming over to you and laying on your chest pressing her breast against you and placing her hand on your chest. "My name's Andrea by the way."

"Mine is Cleo," the Ninetails says moving next to your left arm and pressing it against her breasts.

"You can call me Ariel," the Milotic says taking your right arm.

"And I'm Lily," the Lopunny says getting in a similar position to Andrea.

You look at the four girls beautiful bodies and your body reacts to the way you are touched by them causing your penis to become erect. Before you can hide it Lily and Andrea have reached down and started to stroke it from outside your shorts. "Please, ladies not here," you tell them.

"Well," Ariel says, "we could go to our house."

"Or we could show you around the town some more," Cleo adds, "then go to our house."

'Great either way I'll end up at their house,' you think.
1112221.title: Three's a crowd, four's a party

choices: "Well, I think a booth would be good then." (Rhyhorn)
"I've always enjoyed sitting at the bar." (Gyarados)
"Well...maybe I'll take a table by myself for now." (Vaporeon)
112.content:
As you wander down the street, your stomach begins to rumble. Seems the long walk from the palace is has burned you out some, and luckily there appears to be a sushi bar marked down on the map. You liked sushi; raw fish really tasted good despite what most folk seemed to believe. Even if it could get a little pricey, it was awfully filling when done right, and fresh. As you approach the establishment you see that it's a rather small place overall. Barely twice as big as the door leading in, it stretched down from there in a rectangular shape with a tiny bar built beside the kitchen, and several two to four person booth filling the front half of the bar. Opening the door, you walk in and see that there's only a few girls seated inside at all. Two at the bar, one at a table, and of course the waitress and chef for staff. The chef, an Octillery girl in anthromorph form, waves her a spare hand while the other five work on chopping and preparing dishes. The waitress, in human form and no distinct markings, walks over and bows.

"Welcome Reid-san. Would you like to dine today with us?" She asks.

"Definitely. I love sushi." You reply, smiling back.

"Wonderful! Would you like to sit at the bar, or perhaps at a booth?"

"Hm..." Looking over the tables again, you note the few patrons again. The lone girl at a table is very thick and obviously bored by the look on her face. There's a big grey spiral horn in the middle of her forehead, which you guess to mean she's either a Rhyhorn or Rhydon. Over at the bar, a Gyarados in anthro form is eating rapidly from a large plate of sushi and a mug as big as her, ahem, big lips. A few stools down from her is a Vaporeon, fully Pokemon, sitting atop a barstool eating a fish slow and carefully. She looks to be the most at peace between the three, with her eyes closed in contentment. "Do you think they would mind me joining them?"

Looking back, the waitress giggles and gives him a look that says he's silly. "Of course not!"
112.title: Big Fish, Big Bites

choices: "I certainly don't mind! You're my kind of woman Terra."
"I'm afraid I still want to see a bit more before...things, happen."
1121.content:
Nodding, the waitress happily escorted you over to the girl sitting at the booth. As you approach she looks up from her plate of teriyaki beef and blinks in surprise. You smile back, but get the feeling she's not going to say anything. "Mind if I sit with you?" She shakes her head and then turns back to her meal. Not taking offense is hard, since you'd sworn all the women in the land were excited to meet you. But then again it wasn't like you wanted them swarming to talk and be with you either. As you sit you're handed a menu, and you quickly put in a few orders before turning to the girl across from you.

"I'm Reid."

"Nice to meet you." She replies. Her voice is deep, and perhaps a bit slow to enunciate her words. Your first guess is that she's not very smart, but her eyes when they finally lift up don't show confusion or hesitation. You guess instead that perhaps she doesn't care to hurry. "I'm Terra. It's nice of you to come over and spend some time with me."

"You look a little bored so I thought I'd try to make things interesting." You remark. "This world is so amazing to see. I can't believe I'm going to be living here from now on."

"We all are too." Terra smiles. "Amazed, that is. We've been waiting so long for you..."

A whole world of girls, just waiting for you. Not to mention they could change appearance and size. Looking over Terra some more now up close, you notice further details about her build. She was a very thick girl; not chubby or fat, but rather built with width in mind over height. She had very broad shoulders only outmatched by outrageously wide hips. Her rump had to be pushing her up nearly half a foot or more from the seat, and he could feel the tremendous thighs and legs scooting around his own like walls. Her bust spilled slightly onto the table over the edge of the shirt she wore, easily bigger than her head apiece, and there were several dark freckles dotting the top of her cleavage. Her face was round yet chiseled on the cheeks and jaw, making her a bit more masculine save for the big, red eyes and button-like nose, framed by a long ponytail that trailed around one shoulder and dropped around her sideboob, almost as thick as your arm. Her own limbs were like the rest of her: thick, wide and strong, with big hands that made anything she held look small. Going by how the two of you sat, she must have easily been nearly a foot taller than you if standing.

"...and maybe if you'd like we could...call this a date?" You hear her finish, snapping you out of your inspection.

"W-What?" You stutter.

"Well, I understand if you're not ready for that." She says slowly. "But if you're willing to sit with me you must like me, if only by how I look. Why not call this a date and spend some more time afterwards together? You could come back to my place...and I could...show you a nice time."

You don't get to answer immediately before your sushi arrives. Thanking the server, you take a bite of one roll and carefully chew over it. Terra, on the other side of the table, takes a long piece of beef and pops it into her mouth to do the same. One of her legs pushes in-between yours and thumps against the bottom of your seat. She was definitely straightforward!
1121.title: Big Meal

113.content: Do you find a hotel that specializes in making people's fantasy come true?
113.title: Other.

12.content:
Leaving the more urban areas behind you, the surrounding countryside unfolds before you as you look over the Southern District. In the immediate area are several low farm houses and other important buildings for agriculture. You can even see a few Pokegirls tending to the fields, if not walking down the path at various sizes carrying parts or huge bundles of food. One even approaches with big, thooming steps, and you quickly step aside to let her into the city proper. Judging by her appearance she was a Miltank girl, and the very buxom giantess winks down at you before giving a very notable saunter to her steps as she leaves. Your eyes follow her until she passes out of sight. Looking down at the map again, you follow the little lines until you notice that beyond the farmlands lies a big forest. Many trails and little segments are laid out as parks and nature preserves. You could perhaps take a hike there and see what this world has to offer with its more...natural, beauties. Perhaps meet the more reclusive Pokemon who spend their time out there instead of in the city or working here on the fields. But then beyond even that were the mountains. Towering peaks with snow covering their tops, you could see them from here quite clearly due to the cloudless skies, and like on the map you could just about make out several lodges and other buildings dotting the closest. Obviously they were there to offer more wintry escapes and services, and you couldn't image a less breathtaking sight than to climb to the top of one and gaze down at the new world you were on.

With so many choices before you it's hard to decide! So you fold up the map some, leaving only the Southern District facing up, and close your eyes. Shaking your hand and shuffling the map around counterclockwise, you perform this silly point-and-go action for a minute before a finger lands on...
12.title: Mountains, Forests and Farms, Oh My!

123.content:
It would seem winter wonderlands were in your future. Smiling, you pack up the map again and head off down the trail. Along the way you pass several girls who all call out or wave to you. You wave back, sometimes stopping for a few seconds to talk, but always decline on sticking around. You were determined to stick to your sudden plan. They all seemed sad to watch you leave however, so you noted to come back and revisit.

As you approach the first mountain along the path, the few trees dotting it begin to rise higher in the air, their great branches reaching over one another and creating a roof effect over your head. Soon the sunlight even began to get blotted out, leaving you in false dusk to trek in. It was almost spooky really, with how the atmosphere grew a bit chillier the closer you came to the base of the mountain. As minutes pass even a tiny fog began to fill the air, but luckily not so much that you couldn't read the signs along the path or see where you're going. You don't, however, notice that the path begins to split up, leading off into three different directions.

Crossing through the crossroad itself, you unknowingly venture toward...
123.title: Misty Mountain

choices: "C-Could you help me get back up?"
1232.content:
Seeing the cave opening approach, yours eyes widen in surprise at the sheer size of it. While obviously cut and carved for traffic to pass through, it was still monstrously huge compared to your tinier form. You couldn't help but think a cruise ship could even fit through this opening, as the corners were nearly out of sight and the top was lost in the now thicker fog. Shaking your head, you wish that you had grabbed a flashlight before coming here, but carry on in the hopes that there were lights deeper inside.

Entering the cave, you feel the natural ambience dampen as the walls blot out the forest outside. Tiny dripping pings of water fill the air, your footsteps echoing around inside with each step you take. A chill runs down your spine as the temperature begins to drop. Or was that the feeling of something watching you? It was hard to tell, and you didn't want to sound paranoid. But this cave was very, very creepy...

Minutes stretch on as you plunge deeper, the cave now totally dark as the last of the light from outside vanishes around a corner. Despite your hopes there were no lights within the cave to see by, and when you tried to turn back you must have taken a wrong turn because now you're lost. Calling out for help, you only hear your voice in reply, and that scares you. Who knows if anyone would find you in here?! But you couldn't just rush forward, not when there was no telling what might be lying ahead of you, or just around a corner. However as you keep walking you suddenly feel something hit your left foot, and wouldn't you know it, you trip. Arms flailing, you shout in alarm before falling forward toward the ground. Except the ground never comes. As you flip 180 and continue to tumble down, you realize to your horror that you must have accidentally stumbled across a hole of some kind! A very big, very deep one...since seconds pass and you don't stop falling. You scream out, louder, in fear that this might end your journey short.

Suddenly you hear something very loud echo all around you. A deep thump, the rush of wind, and then - oof! Something incredibly soft has caught you and is bouncing you atop of it. You flop around for several long seconds before coming to a halt, gasping for air. More deep thumps and galeforces winds buffet you, but you're stationary this time. In fact, the wind is quite warm compared to what you've been feeling, and the ground is...fuzzy, almost. Rubbing over it, you can't quite tell what's covering it, but you can feel that thumping rumbling through it very faintly.

"Hello."

You freeze, that deep, scratchy and loud voice breaking from the darkness. "H-Hello?"

Suddenly from above, two giant orbs appear, glowing unnaturally with 'dark' light. They begin to lower down, those gusts of air growing heavier and louder against your body, until they stop almost level with you. It takes you several seconds to realize what they are - eyes! Two enormous eyes with black sclera that glow, and white dots that expand and contract as they focus in on you, obviously acting as the pupils. You can't get the scale of this creature by the eyes alone, but surely they were several hundred feet tall! "Who are you? What are you doing in my hole?" They ask, voice even louder and more powerful from this close. It's easy to tell it's a womans voice even at the volume she booms it.

"I-I-I fell." You admit quickly. "W-Who are you?"

A mouth of jagged lines suddenly lights up below, glowing a faint purple and showing off a mouth of big teeth and a tongue longer and thicker than his entire body. "I'm Whisper, a Haunter!"
1232.title: In The Mountain

choices: "Why are you so big?" You ask.
"Could you help me get out of the mountain?" You ask.
12321.content:
Whisper, obviously, was very big. The hole you'd fallen down was very deep, very wide, and apparently where she lived. Going by the sheer size of her glowing bits of anatomy she must have been several hundred feet tall, with the hand you were in probably as big as the average house. As she leaned in more, the ambient glow allowed you to make out a few more details of her appearance. Towering pillars were behind and to the side of you, their sharp points looking ominous in the dim lighthing. Her face filled the air above and before you, chin and cheeks suggesting she was angelic in looks, even while covered in purple 'fur', with a hair-do styled to match her species headshape. Nothing could be seen of her body besides her hand, and you suspected it might have something to with her kinds free-floating anatomy. Aside from scaring and looming over you, she actually seemed quite nice!

"You look strange for a Pokemon." Scratch that; add on taxing your eardrums. She obviously didn't know to tone down her volume for something as small as you. "Where's your wings or armor?"

"I-I don't have those." You stutter, wincing as she blinks. Her thick eyelashes buffeted you with wind. "I'm Reid, a human. Didn't the empress tell you about me?"

"Empress? What's that?"

"Oh..." Perhaps this was a literal case of living under a rock. Just with a mountain. "Uh, nevermind then. I'm Reid." You hold your hand out by reflex but stop once you remember you're sitting on her hand.

"You're cute." She giggles thunderously. It's almost as high as a cackle, further sending chills down your spine. "I think I'll keep you. Would you like to see my hole little Reid?"

Without a reply, a cluster of blue flames begin to puff into existance around you. Each of them are around the same size as you are, but aside from giving light doesn't seem to heat up the air or you much at all. Slowly the hole, or rather Whisper's hole, becomes visible. The far walls are still almost out of sight, but now you can make her out in more details. Purple skin and fur blend together all over her hand and face, making her look even more haunting in the odd light. Her large, wide eyes gaze down at you with that ever-present grin making the ridged lips of her mouth look like a jack-o-lantern with the backlight coming from her throat. Her hand is indeed floating free of any wrist, but you can see an arm jutting out from her shoulders, and her neck is still attatched to her head. Without prompting she tilts her palm some to give you a better view of herself. Not that it helps much; a massive pair of breasts, more than a handful for her large hand, blocks everything past her slim waist, and bounce prominently free of any stitch of clothing.

Blushing, you try to keep your eyes up on her face, but her eyes unnerve you too as she giggles giddily. What should you do?
12321.title: Stagewhisper

13.content:
You follow the map to the Western district. You see before you a large, bustling city. Taking a look at the map, it extends all the way to the shore. The city is quite large, and full of many tall buildings, landmarks, and of course, the odd girls the empress mentioned.

You decide to go...
13.title: Head to the Western distruict

choices: take a dip in the ocean
go check what pokegirls that are playing in the sand
131.content: You decide to go to the beach. When you you see some ground pokegirls playing in the sand, some ice and water pokegirls playing in the ocean. Then you see some fire,bug,flying pokegirl tanning around the beach area
131.title: To the Beach

1312.content:
You take off your shirt and step into the water, slowly making your way away from the shore. The water is warm, and you relish the feeling of immersion as you head into deeper water. Soon, you are treading water, and you are about to look around for any pokegirls when a voice from behind you calls, "Hey, aren't you Reid?"

You turn around to the sight of a
1312.title: take a dip in the ocean

choices: You take a seat at the bar
132.content:
You enter the club, and you take a look at all the various pokegirls and morphs dancing around.

You wander around a bit shyly until...
132.title: To a Local Club.

choices: You try to make things up as you go along
You run away, too afraid of embarassing yourself
1321.content:
Looking around left and right as you walk around, you notice something green right out of the corner of your eye before you find yourself running into it by accident. You're bumped back slightly, and when you do you get a look at what you just bumped into.

Standing before you is a girl clad in bright green-and-pale green striped pants and a green shirt with a pair of ruby red goggles covering her still visible eyes. Her hair is green, about shoulder length, split into two braids. In addition to all of this she has a pair of elongated diamond shaped green wings with a red border and a long tail that has a pattern just like the pants tipped off with three small diamond shapes similar to the wings.

"Oh, please excuse me miss," you say to the Flygon girl.

"Er, no problem. Hey, you're that human boy everyone's been talking about. Looks like you finally arrived in our little world. What was your name again... Ran, no... Reen, nah... oh wait, now I remember, Reid!"
"Yeah, it seems I'm famous around these parts..."
"Don't be so shy. Let's have some fun together!"

She then starts dancing next to you. Unfortunately, you have can a bit but its breakdancinng, so have no idea what to do next.
1321.title: You accidentally run into someone

1322.content:
... you decide you really need to get off the dance floor before you bump into anyone. Noticing a row of seats against a counter, you weave past the countless dancing females as carefully as you can. Finally, you reach the bar and sit atop the nearest stool.

As you draw yourself up onto the seat, a figure on the opposite side slides into your line of vision.
"Well, hello there!"
The speaker seems to be in her Pokegirl form. She has on a yellow- orange shirt and a pair of hoop earrings. On her cheeks, two yellow circles can be seen. She's a Raichu girl, and judging by the fact that she's on the other side of the counter she's also the bartender.
"I can't help but notice that you seem a little lost. Am I right?"
The Pokegirl placed both arms on the counter and leaned forward. She crossed her legs and cupped her head in her hands.

"Well... kind of. I know where I am, I'm just not sure what to do right now..."
"Close enough. Here, have something to drink." She turned around and grabbed a cup and a bottle. She poured a clear liquid into the cup, then handed it over to you. You picked it up and looked at it.
"It's just water," she laughed, "it's not going to bite you or anything."
Sheepishly, you took a few sips.
"My name's Penny. I'm guessing you're Reid?"
"Yes." you reply between gulps, "nice to meet you, Penny."
"Nice to meet you as well! But what's this about not knowing what to do right now? This is a dance club, after all." She gave you a quick wink.
"Yeah, but... I kinda... um..."
"... Don't know how to dance?"
"Pretty much, yeah."

Penny put her arms back on the counter and rested her chin on a fist, sporting a broad grin that stretched from cheek-circle to cheek-circle.
"Ah, I should have known. Well, you're in luck, Reid, because I know just the person to teach you how...
1322.title: You take a seat at the bar

choices: ... for you to try this on your own feet!"
13221.content:
"Oh?"
"Yep!"
"And... ?"
"And what?"
"Who is this person?"
Penny laughed. "Who do you think it is? Me!" She grabbed one of your hands and began to walk along the side of the counter. You stumbled to your feet and followed her on the other side.
"Whoa, wait! Where are we going?"
Penny finally reached the edge of the bar and spun to face you head on. She placed her hands on your shoulders and started to push you backwards. "The dance floor, silly! No wonder you don't know how to dance- you need everything spoon-fed to you, eh? Don't worry, I'll teach you somehow."
"Hold on! Don't I get any say in this?"
"None whatsoever!"

Penny maneuvered you to the center of the floor despite your half- hearted objections. You weren't angry, just surprised and nervous at how quickly this was going. Penny waved towards a Chatot girl bobbing her head behind the DJ table and gestured. The DJ gave a thumbs up and switched to a song with a fast dance beat.
"Okay, just watch me for a few seconds and join in when you think you've got it."
She began to slide and dance in tune with the music. She moved very quickly, and you could barely keep up. You spent more time recovering from tripping over your own feet than actually dancing.
"Penny, could you slow down? I can't go that fast!"
Penny grabbed your arms and pulled you close to her body. "You need to keep in time with the music. You can't just slow down! Let's try a more hands-on approach."

Her head slowly started to rise. When she was about seven feet tall, she turned you around and placed your heels on her feet. She held your wrists and positioned your elbows and knees to match up against her own. "Ready?"
"It doesn't matter what I answer, does it?"
"Glad to see you're catching on!"
Penny began to dance again, but this time she moved your body in unison with her own. She pressed herself against you as she gyrated and moved with the beat. This was much better. After only a few minutes, you felt like you had a decent grasp of what to do.
"Great! Excellent! You're getting the hang of this!"
"This dance isn't too bad once you know how to move..." Penny cleared her throat, prompting you to add, "Er, and you're a really good teacher."
"Hey, thanks, Reid! That's very nice of you. Since you seem to have this one down, I think it's time...
13221.title: ... Me!"

choices: The two of you continue to dance.
You break the kiss, wanting to go somewhere private with Penny.
132212.content:
Hey, thanks, Reid! That's very nice of you. Since you seem to have this one down, I think it's time we tried a faster song!"

"Wait, I'm not sure I've got this one down all the way ye-"

"Stop trying to make excuses! You'll be fine, I'm sure." Another wave to the DJ, and a new song. This one was much faster, and based on the way the other dancers on the floor began to move, it was meant for very, very close bump & grind. "Give it your best shot, now!"

Penny slid her feet out from under yours and spun around to your front. She pushed her body against you so tightly, you could feel her heartbeat. Her long, thin zig-zag-tipped tail wrapped around one of your legs and one of hers, binding you together while her palms pressed against your own, her fingertips clutched tightly against the back of your hand.

You felt yourself blushing. Her lower body was grinding hard against your own, and she was shaking it in a way that left little to the imagination. Her upper chest was squished against your neck and chin, the soft mounds gently deforming against your body under the pressure. Her face was tilted downward and her nose and lips were smushed against your own...

"Hey, are you even trying?" She teased. You snapped out of your embarrassment at her position. Penny was smirking in amusement. "Is something wrong?"

"N-no, I just wasn't expecting this to be..."

"... Yeeeeees?"

"... such a... close dance."

info.description:
You are Reid, a 20-year-old who is about to get transported to a strange world.

Before we continue on, I should probably clarify a few things that the story will adhere to:

Pretty much every character in this story barring Reid himself is female. Also, they can all switch between three forms:

Pokemon: Yes, I'm sure you know what these are, but also know that within the world Reid will be transported to these Pokemon will be able to speak.

Pokemorph: For the purposes of this story this refers to all anthropomorphic Pokemon that lean more toward their Pokemon form that towards a human form. Example: A Ninetales Pokemorph would have fur all over her body, a muzzle, and paws at the end of her legs (But not necessarily her arms).

Pokegirl: A not-quite-human girl possessing the features of the Pokemon she's based off of. Example: A Ninetales Pokegirl would have long hair the color of a Ninetales' fur, along with the ears and tails of a Ninetales, but would be human in every other way.

To make things even more interesting, they can all change their size at will. And just to make sure you didn't miss it they can switch between the three aforementioned forms at any time.

Other rules:

No vore (Though eating of random mundane fish and already dead/cooked animals is perfectly fine).

No killing (At least, not of Red and any Pokes/morphs/girls anyway).

Stomping's OK, though I'd prefer Reid didn't actually get hit with it.

Sitting on and lying on are not only OK, they're encouraged. Just remember that neither those or stomping should hurt Reid too much.

And obviously things are gonna get a little weird, but don't let it get TOO wild, if you catch my drift.

Also, I don't wanna see any underaged stuff. ><

And also i want to make the chapters long so i would have to copy and edit the guy stroy. fwll free to add people
info.pretty_title: Pokegirls, morph, and growth my version
